data.oai_dc:dc: Saddle (3525 m) climate station: CR21X data.

Climatological data were collected from a Niwot Ridge climate station (Saddle) throughout the year using a Campbell Instruments CR21X data logger. Maximum and minimum values are recorded instantaneously, with the sampling interval being 30 seconds, until 4 February 1991 at which time the sampling interval was changed to 2 seconds. Daily means and totals were calculated from 2880 individual measurements until 4 February 1991 and 43200 after that date. This instrument was programmed to generate both hourly and daily output. Parameters measured include solar radiation, air temperature, relative humidity, barometric pressure, wind speed, wind vector, and wind direction.
